metadata.synopsis: A goblin veteran leading a raid on a druid grove - he's giving orders to his troops

1.speaker: Za'krug
1.text: Scouts - get to the high ground. Raiders - charge the bastards!
1.context: NodeContext: Shouting commands to his troops as they enter combat

0.speaker: Za'krug
0.context: NodeContext: A warcry to his new god, the Absolute
